modules.name: Proact
modules.comments:
Proact is the core library for a family of web frameworks built from
composable components that share a singular state which is composed and
decomposed through Profunctor lenses. This is unlike other functional web
architectures that compose state through user-provided messages that become
boilerplate code in the long run.
Proact also separates the pure elements of a program from its side effects
by using Free commands which are later paired with Cofree actions to create
executable functions.  This strategy was chiefly derived from the
"Free for DSLs, cofree for interpreters" series by Dave Laing.

A web framework using Facebook's React library is provided in this package.

declarations.comments:
A monadic representation of a component that provides access to its
underlying state through the `MonadAsk` interface.
declarations.title: ComponentT

declarations.comments:
A monadic representation of an event handler that manipulates the
component's state through the `MonadState` interface.
declarations.title: EventHandlerT

declarations.comments: Represents a state repository built with a Comonad Transformer.
declarations.title: VaultT

declarations.comments: Applies a hoist transformation to the state repository of a `ComponentT`.
declarations.title: cohoist

declarations.comments:
Applies an interpret transformation to the state repository of a
`ComponentT`.
declarations.title: cointerpret

declarations.comments:
Pairs a `CofreeT` vault with a `FreeT` event handler to trigger an event
action.
declarations.title: dispatch

declarations.comments: Provides an action dispatcher in the context of a Proact `ComponentT`.
declarations.title: dispatcher

declarations.comments:
Changes a `ComponentT`'s state type through the lens of a `Traversal`.
For a less restrictive albeit less general version, consider `focus'`.
declarations.title: focus

declarations.comments:
Changes a `ComponentT`'s state type through a `Lens`.
For a more general albeit more restrictive version, consider `focus`.
declarations.title: focus'

declarations.comments: Changes the type of the state repository through a `Lens`.
declarations.title: focusVault

declarations.comments: Changes a component's state type through the lens of an indexed traversal.
declarations.title: iFocus

declarations.comments: Renders a `ComponentT` in a monadic context.
declarations.title: render

children.comments: Lowers the Cofree Comonad into its Cofree container.
children.title: lowerCofree

children.comments: Peels a layer off a Cofree Comonad.
children.title: peel

declarations.comments:
Represents all Comonads that do no work during the extension step beyond
simply extracting two comonadic values together.
declarations.title: ComonadCofree

declarations.comments:
Represents all Comonads that do no work during the extension step beyond
simply extracting two comonadic values together.
declarations.title: ComonadCofree

children.comments:
Given a homomorphism from `f` to `g` this yields a homomorphism from
`t f` to `t g`.
children.title: hoist

declarations.comments: Represents all transformers that support a natural transformation.
declarations.title: HoistT

children.comments:
Given a homomorphism from `f` to `g` this yields a homomorphism from
`t f m` to `t g m`.
children.title: interpret

declarations.comments:
Represents all transformers' transformers that support a natural
transformation.
declarations.title: InterpretT

declarations.comments:
Unfolds a `CofreeT` Comonad Transformer from a Coalgebra and an initial
Comonad.
declarations.title: coiterT

declarations.comments: Deconstructs a `CofreeT` Comonad Transformer.
declarations.title: runCofreeT

children.comments: Pairs two functors given a pairing function.
children.title: pair

declarations.comments:
Represents all pairings between functors f and g.
This asserts that any sums in f can annihilate any products in g, and vice
versa.
declarations.title: Pairing

children.comments: Pairs two functors given a pairing function with side effects.
children.title: pairM

declarations.comments: Represents a pairing with side effects.
declarations.title: PairingM

declarations.comments: All pairings are symmetric.
declarations.title: sym

declarations.comments: Applies the pair of a function and an argument.
declarations.title: zap

children.comments: Adds a layer to a Free Monad.
children.title: layer

children.comments: Lifts the Free container to a Free Monad.
children.title: liftFree

declarations.comments:
Represents all Monads that do no work during the normalization step beyond
simply grafting two monadic values together.
declarations.title: MonadFree

declarations.comments:
Represents all Monads that do no work during the normalization step beyond
simply grafting two monadic values together.
declarations.title: MonadFree

children.comments:
Given a homomorphism from `f` to `g` this yields a homomorphism from
`t f` to `t g`.
children.title: hoist

declarations.comments: Represents all transformers that support a natural transformation.
declarations.title: HoistT

children.comments:
Given a homomorphism from `f` to `g` this yields a homomorphism from
`t f m` to `t g m`.
children.title: interpret

declarations.comments:
Represents all transformers' transformers that support a natural
transformation.
declarations.title: InterpretT

declarations.comments: Represents the base Functor for a Free Monad.
declarations.title: FreeF

declarations.comments: Represents the Free Monad Transformer for a Functor `f` and a Monad `m`.
declarations.title: FreeT

declarations.comments:
Folds a `FreeT` Monad Transformer into its underlying Monad using an
Algebra.
declarations.title: iterT

declarations.comments: Deconstructs a `FreeT` Monad Transformer.
declarations.title: runFreeT

declarations.comments:
A monadic representation of an event handler that manipulates the
component's state through the `MonadState` interface.
declarations.title: EventHandlerT

declarations.comments: Changes a component's state type through the lens of an indexed traversal.
declarations.title: iFocus

declarations.comments:
Changes a `ComponentT`'s state type through a `Lens`.
For a more general albeit more restrictive version, consider `focus`.
declarations.title: focus'

declarations.comments:
Changes a `ComponentT`'s state type through the lens of a `Traversal`.
For a less restrictive albeit less general version, consider `focus'`.
declarations.title: focus

declarations.comments: Provides an action dispatcher in the context of a Proact `ComponentT`.
declarations.title: dispatcher

declarations.comments: A type synonym for a React Component.
declarations.title: ComponentT

declarations.comments: A type synonym for an Indexed React Component.
declarations.title: IndexedComponentT

declarations.comments:
Dispatches React actions detached from the context of a Component. The
state handled by the actions is seen through a given lens.
declarations.title: dispatch

declarations.comments: Dispatches React actions detached from the context of a Component.
declarations.title: dispatch'

declarations.comments:
Renders a `ReactElement` from a React Context, a Coalgebra and a Proact
Component.
declarations.title: render

children.comments:
Given a homomorphism from `f` to `g` this yields a homomorphism from
`t f` to `t g`.
children.title: hoist

declarations.comments: Represents all transformers that support a natural transformation.
declarations.title: HoistT

children.comments:
Given a homomorphism from `f` to `g` this yields a homomorphism from
`t f m` to `t g m`.
children.title: interpret

declarations.comments:
Represents all transformers' transformers that support a natural
transformation.
declarations.title: InterpretT
